<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<broker xmlns="http://activemq.apache.org/schema/core" start="false">
  <destinationPolicy>
    <policyMap>
      <policyEntries>
        <policyEntry topic=">">
          <pendingMessageLimitStrategy>
            <constantPendingMessageLimitStrategy limit="3000"/>
          </pendingMessageLimitStrategy>
        </policyEntry>
      </policyEntries>
    </policyMap>
  </destinationPolicy>
  <plugins>
  </plugins>
</broker>
